hero.title: Ukuqinisa i-Afrika Ngokufunda Kwedijithali
hero.subtitle: Izindawo Zedijithali Ezihambayo Ezisebenza Ngelanga Eziguqula Imiphakathi
hero.description: Ukuletha amakhono edijithali, ukufinyelela kwezempilo, nolwazi oluqinisekisiwe emiphakathini engenawo amasevisi anele kulo lonke elase-Afrika ngezindawo zokufunda ezintsha.

about.title: Izindawo Zedijithali Ezihambayo Ezintsha
about.subtitle: Iziqukathi zomkhumbi ezisebenza ngelanga eziguqulwe zaba amakilasi edijithali
about.description: Indlela yethu entsha iletha ubuchwepheshe besimanje emiphakathini ekude ngezindawo zokufunda ezihambayo, ezisimeme, nezivumelana namasiko.

curriculum.title: Ukuqeqeshwa Kwamakhono Edijithali Okuphelele
curriculum.subtitle: Kusukela ekufundeni nasekubhaleni okuyisisekelo kuya emakhonweni obuchwepheshe aphezulu

footer.description: Ukuqinisa imiphakathi yase-Afrika ngemfundo yedijithali entsha nezixazululo zobuchwepheshe obusimeme.
